summary: "Hamlet," by William Shakespeare, is a famous play about Prince Hamlet's quest for revenge against his uncle, Claudius. Claudius killed Hamlet's father to become king and marry Hamlet's mom. It's one of the longest and greatest plays in English. Shakespeare wrote it around 1599-1601. The story comes from old legends, like the tale of Amleth from a 13th-century book. Even though it's old, people still love it and change it into new versions.
title: Hamlet
